subject: Hockey, Ice
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: Because of the N.H.L. lockout, Brad Richards is not playing. Instead, he is bringing his quiet brand of leadership to the efforts to repair the damage from Hurricane Sandy.
snippet: Because of the N.H.L. lockout, Brad Richards is not playing. Instead, he is bringing his quiet brand of leadership to the efforts to repair the damage from Hurricane Sandy.
